abstract: The types of interactions that people can perform with an image.

# ImageAnalysisInteraction.InteractionTypes

**Structure**

The types of interactions that people can perform with an image.

## Declaration

```swift
struct InteractionTypes
```

## Specifying types of interactions

- **automatic**: An option that enables interaction with any type of text, symbols, or subjects that the framework recognizes.
- **textSelection**: An option that enables text selection, copying, and translating.
- **dataDetectors**: An option that enables interaction with text of certain formats, such as URLs, email addresses, and physical addresses.
- **imageSubject**: An option that enables people to use a long-press gesture on a subject in an image to separate it from the background.
- **visualLookUp**: An option that presents a button for more information on any subjects the framework recognizes in the image.
- **automaticTextOnly**: An option that enables all interaction types except image subjects and Visual Look Up.

## Creating an interaction

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an instance from a raw type.
- **rawValue**: The corresponding value of the raw type.

## Managing sets

- **Set properties and methods**: The properties and methods that conform to the option set protocol.

## Configuring an image interaction

- **delegate**: The delegate that handles the interaction callbacks.
- **analysis**: The results of analyzing an image for items that people can interact with.
- **view**: The view that uses this interaction.
- **preferredInteractionTypes**: The types of interactions that people can perform with the image.
- **activeInteractionTypes**: The types of interactions that a person actively performs.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- SetAlgebra
